title: Skin shards and refunds
body: If I bought a skin and then I get the skin in the loot system is there a way to refund the skin other than the only 2 refunds that you get?

replies.body: We might be able to work something out!  I can't make any guarantees, but submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll work with you individually to see if there's anything we can do.  See you there!
